comments:
Build 20020409

When launching on a new workspace, I got a parse error in the welcome page.

<log-entry date="Wed Apr 10 10:30:08 CEST 2002">
  <status
     plugin-id="org.eclipse.core.resources"
     severity="INFO"
     message="Error in WelcomeParser.parse"
     code="4">
  </status>
</log-entry>
<log-entry date="Wed Apr 10 10:30:08 CEST 2002">

     plugin-id="org.eclipse.ui"
     severity="ERROR"
     message="An exception occurred when parsing the welcome page"
     code="1">
    <exception
       message="The element type "item" must be terminated by the 
matching end-tag "</item>"."
